reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Demokratian tukeminen monietnisessä Makedoniassa - monikulttuurisuuden vahvistaminen kansalaisyhteiskunnassa
Supporting Democracy in Multi-ethnic Macedonia - Strenghtening Multiculturalism in Civil Society

description.narrative: The project continues strengthening multi-ethnic democracy and stability in Macedonia (FYROM). The continuation project builds upon the previous cooperation project (2015-2017) focusing on strengthening sustainability of the Platform for Multiculturalism. The immediate objectives of the project are to build capacities of the Platform as a CSO on fundraising partnering reaching target groups and to establish the Platform as a legal entity.The practical means to achieve the objectives are capacity building w orkshops for the activists of the Platform on project design partnering and fundraising and meetings with potential project donors and partners.The project is coordinated and monitored by the Kalevi Sorsa Foundation. The project is implemented in close coo peration and continuous dialogue with the main implementing partner in Macedonia the Progres Institute for Social Democracy.
